text: Wojciech Zygmunt Pszoniak (2 May 1942 â€“ 19 October 2020) was a Polish screen and stage actor. He was born in what is now the city of Lviv. His movie credits include The Devil (1972), The Promised Land (1975), The Tin Drum (1979) and Austeria (1983). Pszoniak died in Warsaw on 19 October 2020 from cancer. He was 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Poland Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Actors from Lviv
title: Wojciech Pszoniak
